sections.text: The Environmental Quality Council shall adopt and promulgate rules and regulations to carry out the Wellhead Protection Area Act.SourceLaws 1998, LB 1161, ยง 10.

46-1509.Environmental Quality Council; rules and regulations.

The Environmental Quality Council shall adopt and promulgate rules and regulations to carry out the Wellhead Protection Area Act.

SourceLaws 1998, LB 1161, ยง 10.
